Body: Including different kinds of length distinctions, such as in stressed syllables only, or stressed and unstressed, etc.
Title: How common is phonemic vowel length across languages?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.

OwnerUser.AboutMe: Ich kann ziemlich gut Deutsch, oder so glaube ich, 和会说一点中文，可是说的不好。Have never formally studied linguistics.
